shot_metadata.name: FROST_COVERS_LENS
shot_metadata.title: Frost Covers Lens - Camera Death
shot_metadata.stitch_from: Shot 21: Landscape frozen, Sigrid still singing

progressive_state: Memory ending | Archive closing | Camera frost 90% | Vision failing | Watching: We're expelled

prompt_variants.subject: The camera lens itself being covered by frost spreading from edges toward center, through the ice seeing glimpses of Sigrid aging rapidly, the house now visible and breathing, shadows moving inside.
prompt_variants.action: Frost crystals form on lens edges. Spread inward like reaching fingers. Through gaps in frost, image fragments visible. Sigrid's face - but now older, 30, 40, 50 years old in flashes. House behind her now huge, breathing, walls expanding and contracting. Through lit window, shadows moving inside - five figures, or four, or six. Can't count. Frost continues spreading. Only center of lens clear. Through it: Sigrid now ancient, hair white, still singing same song. Behind her, house door opens. Yellow light spills out. Someone standing in doorway - Magnús? But wrong. Too tall. Too many arms? Or is it sheep standing upright? Frost covers more. Through last clear spot: interior of house visible. Family at table. But are they human? Shapes wrong. Frost nearly complete. Final image: single eye looking directly at camera. Human? Sheep? Sigrid's? Ancient. Knowing. Frost covers completely. Darkness.
prompt_variants.scene: View through frosting lens. Images fragmenting. Time jumping. Reality unstable.
prompt_variants.style: POV shot with frost covering lens progressively (that's where the camera is), fragments visible through ice.
prompt_variants.camera_position: Camera lens POV with frost accumulation, that's where the camera is
prompt_variants.dialogue: (Sigrid, aging voice): '...fyrr en dagur fagur rann'
prompt_variants.negative_prompt: no subtitles, show frost covering lens, fragments through ice, reality breaking, 1080p

others.meta_cinema: Camera as Iceland dying from witnessing its own colonization
others.temporal_fragmentation: Sigrid aging rapidly through frost gaps
others.reality_instability: Human/sheep forms uncertain in final vision
others.witness_death: Camera consciousness failing from trauma exposure

notes.thematic_purpose: Medium becoming message - camera death as Iceland death
notes.revolutionary_element: Unprecedented meta-cinema where equipment becomes character
notes.connection_to_ending: Camera recognizes itself as Iceland in Shot 61
